naslov: Moderna vila - visoki roh bau - Vrsi, Zadar (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Na prodaju je atraktivna vila u visokom roh-bau stanju, smještena u samom centru mjesta Vrsi, svega 20 minuta vožnje do grada Zadra. Objekt je idealan za obiteljsku kuću, kuću za odmor ili investiciju u turistički najam. Lokacija osigurava mir i privatnost, uz neposrednu blizinu svih važnih sadržaja. Lokacija i dostupnost: k.o Vrsi; k.č. 1639/2 https://www.google.com/maps/place/Lipo%C4%8Dnova+ul.,+23235,+Vrsi/@44. 2623423,15.2336037,83m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m6!3m5!1s0x4761f4db0fdd5959:0xf 251df6579677ece!8m2!3d44.2623638!4d15.2334281!16s%2Fg%2F1hhvplm3_? entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYyNi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D  1,1 km (4 min vožnje) do plaže Duboka Draga  2,7 km (5 min vožnje) do plaže Vrsi-Mulo  20 km (20–25 min vožnje) do grada Zadra  U neposrednoj blizini: sportsko-rekreativni centar, Tommy hipermarket, trgovine, kaﬁći, ljekarna, osnovna škola Osnovne informacije:  Površina parcele: 413 m²  Neto površina objekta: 160 m² (prizemlje 60 m² + kat 55 m² + prohodna krovna terasa 45 m²)  Objekt izveden u visokom roh-bau standardu  Planirani završetak radova i ishođenje uporabne dozvole: listopad 2025. Godine Stanje i kvaliteta gradnje  Armirano-betonski skeletni sustav (AB stupovi i grede)  Ispuna od opeke (25 cm), fert stropovi  Kvalitetna PVC stolarija  Glazura  Prohodan ravni krov s toplinskom i hidroizolacijom (TPO membrane)  Pregradni zidovi suha gradnja(Knauf)  Fasada s izolacijom 10 cm stiropor Do sada izvedeno 90% radova. Ostalih 10% ostavljeno kupcu na odabir i na njegov dodatni trošak. Potpuna prilagodba po želji kupca: Kupac ima mogućnost odabrati:  Završne unutarnje materijale – pločice, laminat, sanitarije, rasvjetu, utičnice, prekidače itd.  Vanjsko uređenje dvorišta – izbor podnih površina, zelenilo, bazen ili jacuzzi  Ograde terasa i okućnice – slobodan odabir oblika i materijala  Na krovnoj terasi moguće je postaviti jacuzzi, ležaljke, sunčalište ࿸ ࿹Po dogovoru, nudimo i usluge izvođenja tj postavljanja natuknutih radova. Dodatno prema projektu:  U dvorištu su predviđena dva privatna parkirna mjesta  Prohodna krovna terasa s priključcima za vodu i struju  Objekt je izgrađen kao jedna stambena jedinica, ali ostavljeni su svi priključci za moguću prenamjenu u dvije odvojene stambene jedinice Unutarnji prostor prodaje se nenamjesten! Tlocrtni raspored: Prizemlje:  Ulazni prostor  Kupaonica (tuš kabina, priključci za perilicu, geberit, umivaonik, bojler)  Dvije spavaće sobe  Kuhinja i blagovaonica  Prostrana terasa (moguć bazen, roštilj, jacuzzi...) Kat:  Kupaonica (isti sadržaj kao prizemlje)  Spavaća soba  Kuhinja  Dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom  Nenatkrivena terasa (mogućnost natkrivanja pergolom ili tendom) Krovna terasa:  Prohodna terasa s priključcima za vodu i struju  Mogućnost uređenja kao sunčalište s ležaljkama, pergolom ili jacuzziem  Pogled na uvalu Vrsi-Mulo i planinski masiv Velebita ENGLISH An attractive villa in advanced shell ("roh-bau") condition for sale, located in the very center of Vrsi, just 20 minutes' drive from the city of Zadar. The property is ideal as a family home, holiday residence, or investment in tourist rental. The location provides peace and privacy, while being close to all essential amenities. Location and Accessibility • Cadastral municipality Vrsi; parcel no. 1639/2 https://www.google.com/maps/place/Lipo%C4%8Dnova+ul.,+23235,+Vrsi/@4 4.2623423,15.2336037,83m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m6!3m5!1s0x4761f4db0fdd5959: 0xf251df6579677ece!8m2!3d44.2623638!4d15.2334281!16s%2Fg%2F1hhvplm3 _?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYyNi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D • 1.1 km (4 min drive) to Duboka Draga beach • 2.7 km (5 min drive) to Vrsi- Mulo beach • 20 km (20–25 min drive) to the city of Zadar • Nearby: sports and recreation center, Tommy hypermarket, shops, cafes, pharmacy, elementary school Basic Information: • Land area: 413 m² • Net usable space: 160 m² (ground floor 60 m² + first floor 55 m² + rooftop terrace 45 m²) • Property built to high roh-bau standard • Planned completion and occupancy permit: October 2025 Construction Details and Quality • Reinforced concrete skeletal structure (RC columns and beams) • Brick infill (25 cm), "Fert" concrete beam ceilings • High-quality PVC windows and doors • Cement screed installed on all floors • Walkable flat roof with thermal and waterproof TPO membrane • Interior walls and lining built with dry construction system (Knauf) • Facade insulation with 10 cm Styrofoam 90% of construction is completed. Remaining 10% left for the buyer to choose and complete at their own expense. Full Customization Available The buyer can choose: • Interior finishings – tiles, laminate, sanitary ware, lighting, outlets, switches, etc. • Yard landscaping – selection of paving surfaces, greenery, pool or jacuzzi • Fencing and terrace railings – free choice of design and material • Rooftop terrace can accommodate a jacuzzi, loungers, sun deck ࿸࿹࿺ Upon agreement, we also offer services for the execution and installation of selected works. Additional Features According to Project: • Two private parking spaces in the yard • Rooftop terrace with water and electricity connections • Property designed as a single residential unit, with infrastructure in place for possible conversion into two separate units Interior space is sold unfurnished! Floor Plan: Ground Floor: • Entrance area • Bathroom (shower cabin, washing machine connections, Geberit, sink, water heater) • Two bedrooms • Kitchen and dining area • Spacious terrace (possibility for pool, grill, jacuzzi...) First Floor: • Bathroom (same features as ground floor) • Bedroom • Kitchen • Living room with dining area • Uncovered terrace (possibility of covering with pergola or awning) Rooftop Terrace: • Walkable terrace with water and electricity connections • Can be arranged as sunbathing area with loungers, pergola or jacuzzi • Views of Vrsi-Mulo bay and the Velebit mountain range ۝Price: • 369.000,00€ Contact: • Lukas Čegrlj +385998025245(Croatia) ៿ E-Mail: • cegrlj.lukas97@gmail.com
